chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info: The Creator, p. 9 (ix)—The creator of the Universe, people, places, things, the True Source, everything in existence. An alternate name would be God. After He created the world, the Creator made a prison for Shai'tan, the Dark One, his complete opposite in every way, to keep him from influencing the world. The Creator is bent on non-interference—He will not directly influence events in the world, instead using a “Chosen One” or tugging at the Pattern of the Age in hopes that what He wants to occur will occur, instead of just making it happen. See also Dragon, The; Dragon Reborn; Shai'tan.
